message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, as it's worth $15,000 to you.  Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $12,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to be closer to my asking price. How about $13,500?  This would still be a good deal for you, considering the value you place on the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. That's the lowest I can go.
